name: add
info:
Manages creation, adding data to Plotly-chart.

This node can manage creation and adding data to multiple plotly-charts.

Plotly-charts are created using create-node and chart-node.

flow.name: Draw plotly-data
flow.format:
<script src="https://cdn.plot.ly/plotly-3.1.0.min.js" charset="utf-8"></script>
<script src="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.7.1.min.js"
    integrity="sha256-/JqT3SQfawRcv/BIHPThkBvs0OEvtFFmqPF/lYI/Cxo=" crossorigin="anonymous">
</script>
<script src="https://cdn.plot.ly/plotly-locale-fi-latest.js"></script>
<script>Plotly.setPlotConfig({locale: 'fi-FI'})</script>
<script> 
    function updateRTChart(traceName, value, timestamp, chart_id,chart_history_size, line_params,y_axis, chart_mode,chart_type, marker_params,hover_template) {
        
        let trace = {}

        if(Array.isArray(value) && Array.isArray(timestamp)){
            trace = {
                mode: chart_mode,
                type: chart_type,
                x: timestamp,
                y: value,
                name: traceName,
                line:line_params,
                yaxis: y_axis,
                marker:marker_params,
                hovertemplate:hover_template
            };
        }
        else{
            trace = {
                mode: chart_mode,
                type: chart_type,
                x: [timestamp],
                y: [value],
                name: traceName,
                line:line_params,
                yaxis: y_axis,
                marker:marker_params,
                hovertemplate:hover_template
            };
        }

        let chart_element = document.getElementById(chart_id);
        let targetIndex = findOutIndexOfPlotlyChartTrace(chart_element, trace)
        
        // Update data to existing chart
        if (targetIndex !== -1) {
            let data_x = chart_element.data[targetIndex].x;
            let data_y = chart_element.data[targetIndex].y;

            let updated_x = data_x.concat(trace.x);
            let updated_y = data_y.concat(trace.y);

            if (updated_x.length  == chart_history_size) {
                updated_x.shift()
                updated_x.shift()
            }
            else if (updated_x.length  > chart_history_size) {
                updated_x = updated_x.slice(Math.max(updated_x.length - chart_history_size, 0))
                updated_y = updated_y.slice(Math.max(updated_y.length - chart_history_size, 0))
            }

            trace.x = [updated_x]
            trace.y = [updated_x]

            //Plotly.update(chart_element, trace, {}, [targetIndex]);

            Plotly.update(chart_element, {
                x: [updated_x],
                y: [updated_y],
                yaxis: y_axis
            }, {}, [targetIndex]);  
        }
        // Add trace to chart
        else {
            Plotly.addTraces(chart_element, trace);
        }
    }

    function addDataToChart(traceName, value, timestamp, chart_id, chart_history_size, line_params,y_axis, chart_mode,chart_type, marker_params,hover_template){
        let trace = {}
        
        trace = {
            mode: chart_mode,
            type: chart_type,
            x: timestamp,
            y: value,
            name: traceName,
            line:line_params,
            yaxis: y_axis,
            marker:marker_params,
            hovertemplate:hover_template
        };


        let chart_element = document.getElementById(chart_id);
        let targetIndex = findOutIndexOfPlotlyChartTrace(chart_element, trace);

        Plotly.update(chart_element, {
            x: [timestamp],
            y: [value],
            yaxis: y_axis
        }, {}, [targetIndex]);

    }


    function findOutIndexOfPlotlyChartTrace(chart_element, trace) {
        // Find out index of data
        let targetIndex = -1
        try {
            for (let k = 0; k < (chart_element.data).length; k++) {
                if (chart_element.data[k].name == trace.name) {
                    targetIndex = k;
                }
            }
        } catch (e) {
            targetIndex = -1
        }

        return targetIndex
    }
    
    // Subscribe to the incoming msg's
    this.$socket.on('msg-input:' + this.id, function(msg) {
        
        let action = msg.action;
        
        if(action == "create"){
            
            let dom_id  = msg.chart_name;
            console.log("Create chart to: "+dom_id)
            if(document.getElementById(dom_id) !== null){
                try{
                    let data = msg.payload.data;
                    let config = msg.payload.config;
                    let layout = msg.payload.layout;    
                    let chart_name = dom_id;
                    let graphDiv = document.getElementById(chart_name)
                    //console.log(layout)
                    //console.log(config)
                    //Plotly.newPlot(chart_name, [], [], config);
                    Plotly.newPlot(chart_name, data, layout, config);
                    console.log("Plotly chart "+chart_name+" created")
                    //Plotly.update(chart_name,data,layout)
                    /*
                    for(let trace in data){
                        Plotly.addTraces(chart_name, data[trace]);
                    } 
                    */    
                }
                catch(e){
                    // Pass this error
                    console.log(e)
                    console.log("Plotly not yet ready or available")
                }
            }
            else{
                // pass this error
                console.log("Plotly chart already created")
            }
            
            
        }   
        else if(action == "update_data"){          
            
            let dom_id = msg.chart_name;
            //console.log("Update data in: "+dom_id)
            if(document.getElementById(dom_id) !== null){
                try{
                    let value = msg.payload.value;
                    let timestamp = msg.payload.timestamp;
                    let traceName = msg.topic;
                    let chart_name = dom_id;
                    let chart_history_size = msg.payload.chart_history_size;
                    let line_params = msg.line_params;
                    let y_axis = msg.y_axis
                    let chart_mode = msg.chart_mode;
                    let chart_type = msg.chart_type;
                    let marker_params = msg.marker_params;
                    let hover_template = msg.hover_template;
                    updateRTChart(traceName, value, timestamp, chart_name, chart_history_size, line_params,y_axis,chart_mode,chart_type, marker_params,hover_template)
                }
                catch(e){
                    // Pass this error
                    // console.log("Append data failed: "+e)
                    // console.log(msg)
                }
            }
            else{
                // pass this error, page is not active where charts are
                // console.log("Plotly element: "+dom_id+" does not exist on DOM.")
            }
            
            
        }
        else if(action == "add_data"){          
            
            let dom_id = msg.chart_name;
            //console.log("Adding data to: "+dom_id)
            if(document.getElementById(dom_id) !== null){
                try{
                    let value = msg.payload.value;
                    let timestamp = msg.payload.timestamp;
                    let traceName = msg.topic;
                    let chart_name = dom_id;
                    let chart_history_size = msg.payload.chart_history_size;
                    let line_params = msg.line_params;
                    let y_axis = msg.y_axis
                    let chart_mode = msg.chart_mode;
                    let chart_type = msg.chart_type;
                    let marker_params = msg.marker_params;
                    let hover_template = msg.hover_template;
                    addDataToChart(traceName, value, timestamp, chart_name, chart_history_size, line_params,y_axis,chart_mode,chart_type, marker_params,hover_template)
                }
                catch(e){
                    // Pass this error
                    // console.log("Append data failed: "+e)
                    // console.log(msg)
                }
            }
            else{
                // pass this error, page is not active where charts are
                // console.log("Plotly element: "+dom_id+" does not exist on DOM.")
            }
            
            
        }


        else if(action == "clear"){ 
            let data = []; 
            let chart_name = msg.chart_name;
            Plotly.newPlot(chart_name, data);
        }    
    })
</script>

flow.name: status
